level.heading: Reporting requirements.
level.text: Within 30 calendar days after the end of the school year, the Chancellor shall submit to the Office of the State Superintendent of Education the name of each:
Student who was identified as at risk of retention pursuant to 5-E DCMR ยง 2200.9 and a description of intervention services provided to the student; and
Retained student, the underlying reason for the retention decision, and whether the student was identified as at risk of retention pursuant to the requirements of 5-E DCMR ยง 2200.9.
